title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
**Unlock the Wonder of Engineering with Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers**

Dive into the world of structural engineering with our award-winning Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Kit, a vibrant blue science and engineering kit that will captivate and educate young minds. This kit is a Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, ensuring quality and excellence in learning.

**Key Features:**

- **20 Models to Build:** Construct a variety of impressive structures including truss bridges, arch bridges, cantilever bridges, rope bridges, and suspension bridges.
- **285 Pieces:** Each piece is precision-engineered to ensure a perfect build every time.
- **36-Page Illustrated Manual:** This comprehensive guide will walk you through each experiment with clear, step-by-step instructions and detailed illustrations.
- **Intermediate Skill Level:** Perfect for those looking to take their engineering skills to the next level.
- **Learn About Forces:** Explore the concepts of force, load, compression, and tension as you build and test your creations.
- **Structural Marvels:** Discover columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary structures.
- **Real-World Engineering:** Understand tension, compression, shear, and bending forces in your builds.
- **Comprehensive Learning:** Gain insights into mechanical physics, structural engineering, and the optimization of safety and cost.

**Experience the Thrill of Building:**

- **Truss Bridge:** Test your engineering skills by building a strong, yet lightweight truss bridge.
- **Arch Bridge:** Witness the power of arch structures as you construct a sturdy arch bridge.
- **Cantilever Bridge:** Challenge yourself with the complex design of a cantilever bridge.
- **Rope Bridge:** Create a simple yet effective rope bridge to understand basic tension forces.
- **Suspension Bridge:** Combine arches and cables to build a suspension bridge that defies gravity.

With Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers, you're not just building models; you're laying the foundation for a future in engineering. Order now and embark on a thrilling journey of discovery and learning!
